#include <bits/stdc++.h>

#define INF 0x3f3f3f3f
#define NINF -0x3f3f3f3f

using namespace std;

typedef pair<int,int> pii;

int arr[100005];
int cnt[500][100999];

int main ()
{
	int n;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	
	int u;
	scanf("%d",&u);
	
	for (int i = 0; i < u; i += 1)
	{
		int a,b;
		scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
		
		if (a < 500)
		{
			++cnt[a][b];
		}
		else
		{
			for (int j = b; j <= n; j += a)
				++arr[j];
		}
	}
	
	for (int i = 1; i < 500; i += 1)
	{
		for (int j = 1; j <= n; j += 1)
		{
			arr[j] += cnt[i][j];
			cnt[i][j+i] += cnt[i][j];
		}
	}
	
	for (int i = 1; i <= n; i += 1)
	{
		printf("%d ",arr[i]);
	}
	printf("\n");
	
	return 0;
}
